channel-type.label: Update Available
channel-type.description: Car software or map update available

channel-type.label: Update Status
channel-type.description: Car software or map update status

channel-type.label: Update Version
channel-type.description: Car software or map version to update to

channel-type.label: Route Destination
channel-type.description: Name of the destination

channel-type.label: Route Location
channel-type.description: Location of the destination

channel-type.label: Distance To Arrival
channel-type.description: Distance to drive to the destination (in miles)

channel-type.label: Minutes To Arrival
channel-type.description: Minutes to drive to the destination

channel-type.label: Traffic Delay
channel-type.description: Delay to arrive at the destination due to traffic

channel-type.label: Auto Conditioning
channel-type.description: Turns on auto-conditioning (a/c or heating)

channel-type.label: Autopark State
channel-type.description: Undocumented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Autopark Style
channel-type.description: Undocumented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Battery Current
channel-type.description: Current (Ampere) floating into (+) or out (-) of the battery

channel-type.label: Battery Heater
channel-type.description: Indicates if the battery heater is switched on

channel-type.label: Battery Heater Power
channel-type.description: Indicates if there is enough power to use the battery heater

channel-type.label: Battery Level
channel-type.description: State of the battery in %

channel-type.label: Battery Range
channel-type.description: Range of the battery

channel-type.label: Calendar Enabled
channel-type.description: Indicates if access to a remote calendar is enabled

channel-type.label: Central Display State
channel-type.description: Indicates the state of the central display in the vehicle

channel-type.label: Center Rear Seat Heater
channel-type.description: Indicates if the center rear seat heater is switched on

channel-type.label: Charge
channel-type.description: Start (ON) or stop (OFF) charging

channel-type.label: Charge Cable
channel-type.description: Undocumented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Set Charging Amps
channel-type.description: Current (Ampere) to use for charging

channel-type.label: Charge Current
channel-type.description: Current (Ampere) requested from the charger

channel-type.label: Charge Enable Request
channel-type.description: Undocumented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Charge Energy Added
channel-type.description: Energy added, in kWh, during the last charging session

channel-type.label: Charge Limit
channel-type.description: Limit charging of the vehicle to the given %

channel-type.label: Charge Limit Maximum
channel-type.description: Maximum charging limit of the vehicle, as %

channel-type.label: Charge Limit Minimum
channel-type.description: Minimum charging limit of the vehicle, as %

channel-type.label: Charge Limit SOC Standard
channel-type.description: Standard charging limit of the vehicle, in %

channel-type.label: Ideal Charge Distance Added
channel-type.description: Ideal range added during the last charging session

channel-type.label: Charge Max Current
channel-type.description: Maximum current (Ampere) that can be requested from the charger

channel-type.label: Rated Charge Distance Added
channel-type.description: Rated range added during the last charging session

channel-type.label: Charge Rate
channel-type.description: Distance per hour charging rate

channel-type.label: Charge Starting Range
channel-type.description: Undocumented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Charge Starting SOC
channel-type.description: Undocumented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Charging State
channel-type.description: “Starting”, “Complete”, “Charging”, “Disconnected”, “Stopped”, “NoPower”

channel-type.label: Charge To Max Range
channel-type.description: Indicates if the charging to the maximum range is enabled

channel-type.label: Charge Port
channel-type.description: Open the Charge Port (ON) or indicates the state of the Charge Port (ON/OFF if Open/Closed)

channel-type.label: Charge Current
channel-type.description: Current (Ampere) actually being drawn from the charger

channel-type.label: Charger Phases
channel-type.description: Indicates the number of phases (1 to 3) used for charging

channel-type.label: Charger Maximum Current
channel-type.description: Maximum current (Ampere) that can be delivered by the charger

channel-type.label: Charger Power
channel-type.description: Power actually delivered by the charger

channel-type.label: Charger Voltage
channel-type.description: Voltage (V) actually presented by the charger

channel-type.label: Climate
channel-type.description: Climate status indicator

channel-type.label: Driver Front Door
channel-type.description: Indicates if the front door at the driver's side is opened

channel-type.label: Door Lock
channel-type.description: Lock or unlock the car

channel-type.label: Driver Rear Door
channel-type.description: Indicates if the rear door at the driver's side is opened

channel-type.label: Driver Temperature
channel-type.description: Indicates the auto conditioning temperature set at the driver's side

channel-type.label: Event Timestamp
channel-type.description: Timestamp of the last event received from the Tesla streaming service

channel-type.label: Estimated Battery Range
channel-type.description: Estimated battery range

channel-type.label: Estimated Range
channel-type.description: Estimated range of the vehicle

channel-type.label: Fan
channel-type.description: Indicates the speed (0-7) of the fan

channel-type.label: Flash Lights
channel-type.description: Flash the lights of the car (when ON is received)

channel-type.label: Front Defroster
channel-type.description: Indicates if the front defroster is enabled

channel-type.label: Front Trunk
channel-type.description: Indicates if the front trunk is opened, or open the front trunk when ON is received

channel-type.label: GPS Time Stamp
channel-type.description: Time stamp of the most recent GPS location of the vehicle

channel-type.label: Heading
channel-type.description: Indicates the (compass) heading of the car, in 0-360 degrees

channel-type.label: Estimated Heading
channel-type.description: Estimated (compass) heading of the car, in 0 to 360 degrees

channel-type.label: Honk the Horn
channel-type.description: Honk the horn of the vehicle, when ON is received

channel-type.label: Homelink Nearby
channel-type.description: Indicates if the Home Link is nearby

channel-type.label: Ideal Battery Range
channel-type.description: Indicates the Batter Range

channel-type.label: Inside Temperature
channel-type.description: Indicates the inside temperature of the vehicle

channel-type.label: Left Temperature Direction
channel-type.description: Not documented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Last Autopark Error
channel-type.description: Not documented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Location
channel-type.description: The actual position of the vehicle

channel-type.label: Left Seat Heater
channel-type.description: Indicates if the left seat heater is switched on

channel-type.label: Left Rear Seat Heater
channel-type.description: Indicates if the left rear seat heater is switched on

channel-type.label: Left Rear Backseat Heater
channel-type.description: Indicates the level (0,1,2 or 3) of the left rear backseat heater

channel-type.label: Managed Charging
channel-type.description: Indicates managed charging is active

channel-type.label: Managed Charging Cancelled
channel-type.description: Indicates managed charging is cancelled by the user

channel-type.label: Managed Charging Start Time
channel-type.description: Not documented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Max Charges
channel-type.description: Indicates the number of consecutive "Max Range Charges" performed by the vehicle

channel-type.label: Minimum Temperature
channel-type.description: Indicates the minimal inside temperature of the vehicle

channel-type.label: Maximum Temperature
channel-type.description: Indicates the maximum inside temperature of the vehicle

channel-type.label: Mobile Enabled
channel-type.description: Indicates whether the vehicle can be remotely controlled

channel-type.label: Not Enough Power
channel-type.description: Indicates if not enough power (ON) is available to heat the vehicle

channel-type.label: Notifications Enabled
channel-type.description: Not documented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Notifications Supported
channel-type.description: Not documented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Odometer
channel-type.description: Odometer of the vehicle

channel-type.label: Outside Temperature
channel-type.description: Indicates the outside temperature of the vehicle

channel-type.label: Parsed Calendar Supported
channel-type.description: Not documented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Passenger Temperature
channel-type.description: Indicates the auto conditioning temperature set at the passenger's side

channel-type.label: Passenger Front Door
channel-type.description: Indicates if the front door at the passenger's side is opened

channel-type.label: Passenger Rear Door
channel-type.description: Indicates if the rear door at the passenger's side is opened

channel-type.label: Power
channel-type.description: Net kW flowing in (+) or out (-) of the battery

channel-type.label: Preconditioning
channel-type.description: Indicates if preconditioning is activated

channel-type.label: Range
channel-type.description: Vehicle range - Not documented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Rear Defroster
channel-type.description: Indicates if the rear defroster is enabled

channel-type.label: Remote Start
channel-type.description: Not documented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Rear Trunk
channel-type.description: Indicates if the rear trunk is opened, or open/close the rear trunk when ON/OFF is received

channel-type.label: Remote Start
channel-type.description: Not documented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Remote Start Supported
channel-type.description: Not documented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Right Seat Heater
channel-type.description: Indicates if the right seat heater is switched on

channel-type.label: Right Rear Seat Heater
channel-type.description: Indicates if the right rear seat heater is switched on

channel-type.label: Right Rear Backseat Heater
channel-type.description: Indicates the level (0,1,2 or 3) of the right rear backseat heater

channel-type.label: Right Temperature Direction
channel-type.description: Not documented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Scheduled Charging Pending
channel-type.description: Indicates if a scheduled charging session is still pending

channel-type.label: Scheduled Charging Start
channel-type.description: Indicates when the scheduled charging session will start, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss format

channel-type.label: Sentry Mode
channel-type.description: Activates or deactivates sentry mode

channel-type.label: Sentry Available
channel-type.description: Indicates whether sentry mode is currently available

channel-type.label: Shift State
channel-type.description: Indicates the state of the transmission, “P”, “D”, “R”, or “N”

channel-type.label: Side Mirror Heaters
channel-type.description: Indicates if the side mirror heaters are switched on

channel-type.label: Smart Preconditioning
channel-type.description: Indicates if smart preconditioning is switched on

channel-type.label: State of Charge
channel-type.description: State of Charge, in %

channel-type.label: Speed
channel-type.description: Vehicle speed

channel-type.label: State
channel-type.description: “online”, “asleep”, “waking”

channel-type.label: Steering Wheel Heater
channel-type.description: Turns On/Off the steering wheel heater

channel-type.label: Sunroof State
channel-type.description: Valid states are “unknown”, “open”, “closed”, “vent”, “comfort”. Accepts commands "close" and "vent".

channel-type.label: Sunroof
channel-type.description: Indicates the opening state of the sunroof (0% closed, 100% fully open)

channel-type.label: Combined Temperature
channel-type.description: Combined average temperature of the driver and passenger autoconditioning settings. The temperature for the driver and passenger will be synced when set.

channel-type.label: Time To Full Charge
channel-type.description: Number of hours to fully charge the battery

channel-type.label: Trip Charging
channel-type.description: Not documented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Usable Battery Level
channel-type.description: Indicates the % of battery that can be used for vehicle functions like driving

channel-type.label: User Charge Enable Request
channel-type.description: Not documented / To be defined

channel-type.label: Valet Mode
channel-type.description: Enable or disable Valet Mode

channel-type.label: Valet PIN Required
channel-type.description: Indicates if a PIN code is required to disable valet mode

channel-type.label: Wake Up
channel-type.description: Wake up the vehicle from a (deep) sleep

channel-type.label: Wiperblade Heater
channel-type.description: Indicates if the wiperblade heater is switched on
